Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: PRODAJA - LUKSUZNA VILA NA MORU - KORČULA Dobrodošli u predivnu vilu koja se smjestila u Hrvatskoj na jednom od najljepših i najsunčanijih otoka - na Korčuli. 4 spavaće sobe, 2 kupaonice, soba za biljar s barom, vrtni roštilj , privatna plaža, bazen i vrt, parkirno mjesto Vila je idealno mjesto za odmor ili život za sve. Okolina, privatnost , okoliš i more je ono što se ovdje najviše cijeni. Smještena je u malom mjestu na Korčuli , prvi red uz plažu s pogledom na more i okolne otočiće. Kamena vila, građena stilom karatkterističnim za Dalmaciju kao što je i uređen vrt s mediteranskim biljem od kojeg se privatnim putem dolazi do plaže. Vila je posebna zbog svojih brojnih sadržaja: -Prekrasna terasa na otvorenom s pogledom na more -Natkrivena terasa sa stolom i stolcima -Grill i otvorena blagovaonica na terasi uz vrt -Bazen s terasom za sunčanje i sjenicom -Privatni mol na plaži s ležaljkama i suncobranima Vila se sastoji od prizemlja i prvog kata. U prizemlju su kuhinja, blagovaonica s kaminom, 2 spavaće sobe, 1 kupaonica, velika djelomično natkrivena terasa, roštilj i vešeraj. Na prvom katuse nalazi aperitiv bar sa stolom za biljar, 2 spavaće sobe, 1 kupaonica i balkon. Kat je postignut putem vanjskog stubišta. Vila je klimatizirana. U divnom parku s bazenom, sjenicom i terasom za sunčanje s ležaljkama i klupama. Vila ima privatni vez za čamce. Idealno za obitelj i prijatelje. Najbliže trgovine i restorani nalaze se u veloj Luci koja je udaljena samo 9km. Mnogi restorani nude tradicionalna jela s domaćim vinom. CIJENA NA UPIT BEAUTIFUL VILLA FOR SALE - LOCATED AT ISLAND KORČULA Welcome to a beautiful villa located in Croatia on one of the most beautiful and sunniest islands - on Korcula. 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, billiard room with bar, garden grill, private beach, pool and garden, parking space The villa is an ideal place for vacation or life for all. The environment, privacy, the environment and the sea is what is most appreciated here. It is located in a small village on Korcula, first row to the beach overlooking the sea and surrounding islands. Stone villa, built in a style characteristic of Dalmatia, as well as a landscaped garden with Mediterranean plants from which a private road leads to the beach. The villa is special because of its many facilities: -Beautiful outdoor terrace overlooking the sea -Covered terrace with table and chairs -Grill and open dining area on the terrace next to the garden -Pool with sun terrace -Private deck on the beach with deck chairs and umbrellas The villa consists of a ground floor and a first floor. The ground floor has a kitchen, dining room with fireplace, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, large partially covered terrace, barbecue and laundry. On the first floor there is an aperitif bar with a pool table, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a balcony. The floor is reached via an external staircase. The villa is air conditioned. In a beautiful park with a swimming pool, sun terrace with sun loungers and benches. Ideal for family and friends. The nearest shops and restaurants are located in Vela Luka, which is only 9 km away. Many restaurants offer traditional dishes with local wine. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Federica Grisogona 8, Zadar
